page.shortlink: api desktop api xdialog commands stick to
page.description: The {STICKTO} command defines which side(s) of the dialog box the control or region should stick to when the dialog box is stretched.

argument.name: Horizontal
argument.description: Character. Optional. The allowed values are: "Left", "Right".

argument.name: Vertical
argument.description: Character. Optional. The allowed values are: "Top", "Bottom".
